list.name: Worker Reschedule

options.content:
* You can select multiple workers from the Drop Down above
* Stats in all panels will be based on selected workers

panels.description: Avg of utilization across all selected workers and instances
panels.title: CPU

panels.description:
GPU Shutdown Temp: 90 C
GPU Slowdown Temp: 87 C
GPU Max Operating Temp: 83 C
panels.title: GPU Avg. Temp

options.content:
* It shows the compute instance that a particular worker was scheduled on at any time
* Worker that were moved to a different node will have more than one row for placement on each node
* Workers that are added later (as scale up) would show with partial lines

panels.title: GPU Avg Mem Usage per Worker
GPU Avg Mem Copy Utilization per Worker

targets.expr:
avg(1 - rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance)
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

(
    node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - 
    node_memory_MemFree_bytes - 
    node_memory_Buffers_bytes - 
    node_memory_Cached_bytes
)
/
node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$ip"}
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

sum by (instance) (rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval]))
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

sum by (instance) (rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval]))
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

(
  sum by (instance, device) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"$ip"}) - 
  sum by (instance, device) (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance=~"$ip"})
) / 
sum by (instance, device) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"$ip",device!~"none|shm|tmpfs|cloud-metadata|accounting|.*vda15"})
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

sum by (instance) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip",device=~"eth.*"}[$__interval]))
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

sum by (instance) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip",device=~"eth.*"}[$__interval]))
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

sum by (instance) (rate(node_infiniband_port_data_transmitted_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval]))
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

sum by (instance) (rate(node_infiniband_port_data_received_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval]))
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

sum by (instance) (
  rate({__name__=~"node_infiniband_.*(error|downed|discards|dropped).*", instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval])
)
* on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
* on(nodename) group_left(pod) label_move(kube_pod_info{pod=~"worker.*"}, "node", "nodename")

list.description: Select as many workers as you need to check their aggregate and separate stats in panels.
list.label: Workers
list.name: worker
